items.sentence: I guess everybody thinks that I\'m in love with Mary.
There were no customers, so we closed the shop early.
They demolished the old temple to build a skyscraper.
I wish I could\'ve eaten at that restaurant with you.
I wish I could\'ve stuck around for a few more hours.
It\'s possible that I might be in Boston next Monday.
It\'s snowed a lot more this winter than last winter.
Tom sometimes says things he doesn\'t really believe.
I\'ll ask Tom to meet you tomorrow at three o\'clock.
Tom wants us to think he\'s richer than he really is.
